message:
Confirm object synset assignment.
Object assigned to synset: sweet_pepper.n.01
Definition: plant bearing large mild thick-walled usually bell-shaped fruits; the principal salad peppers
Reminder: synset should match the object and not its contents.
(e.g. orange juice bottle needs to match orange_juice__bottle.n.01
and not orange_juice.n.01)

Confirm reasonable bounding box size:
1.33m, 1.21m, 1.02m
Make sure these sizes are within the same order of magnitude you expect from this object IRL.
complaint: way too big order of m
